custom-meta.meta-value: The data and blood samples are from the local Centre for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) in Hubei Province. Population data based on the 2009 censuses was integrated in terms of the administrative code provided by Hubei Provincial Bureau of Statistics. Censuses data and Map data at a scale of 1:4000, 000 were uploaded as Supporting Information. Restricted Data is available upon request form the following sources: HFRS data: Hubei Provincial Centre for Disease Control and Prevention Name: Xixiang Huo E-mail: xixianghuo@163.com Climate data: Hubei Provincial Meteorological Bureau Tel: +86-027-67847837 Website: http://www.hbqx.gov.cn/.
